english.segment1: I never said I'd prove it, I only said I'd show it. I gave you my all, but you wanted more. Lost on the inside, filling up the score.
english.segment2: I remember playing that one. It's stuck in my head. Over and Over. I took and you bled.
english.segment3: I never said I'd prove it, I only said I'd show it. I gave you my all, but you wanted more. Lost on the inside, filling up the score.
english.segment4: I am impatient. Misunderstood. What ever it is, I've got what it cured. To your arms I run. My own life, it crumbles. No longer am I damned. No longer do I stumble.
english.segment5: I remember playing that one. It's stuck in my head. Over and Over. I took and you bled.
